ygData.subject: RE: EVARCRACK REINS SUPREME!
ygData.msgSnippet: BWHAAA HA HA HA HA HA HA! Sony s plan to addict all known peoples and make zombies out of them has claimed another soul for their army of consumers! Soon the
ygData.messageBody:
BWHAAA HA HA HA HA HA HA!

Sony's plan to addict all known peoples and make zombies out of them has
claimed another soul for their army of consumers! Soon the market will
be flooded with Sony Zombies buying everything related to Sony and
Everquest. The brainwashing is working perfectly!
The fools! Do they not realize the power that Sony has over them?
Do they not realize the contributions they are making to the
capitalistic ways of the Sony Clan?
As long as this plan holds there is no telling how far it can go! Sony
will rule the world!!!!!

(he, he, he. Sorry, don't know where that came from!) Anyway I really
need to get back to playing Everquest!

(Acts very jittery and rubs inside of arm intensely.)

-----Original Message-----
Message: 7
Date: Tue, 30 Jul 2002 08:56:01 -0700 (PDT)
From: Melanie Roark <melanie_6602@...>
Subject: Re: Digest Number 543


I guess I got lucky. When I brought EQ home, my boyfriend didn't seem
too interested at first since it wasn't a sport game. But then I left
him alone one night for about two hours and when I got back, he was
hooked. A month later we had to get a 2nd computer and a 2nd acct.
Nadenu Willowmist, Druid of Tholuxe Paells
